title: New: Jamie Isaac – Blue Break
body: Anyone who frequents this site will no doubt have realised my recently discovered adoration of the music created by seventeen year old London based producer **Jamie Isaac**. His lo-fi recording aesthetics and poignantly mournful tracks have already elevated him to being one of the most exciting young prospects in music. With new track _Blue Break_, **Isaac** picks up where _[Softly Draining Seas](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11038-new-jamie-isaac-softly-draining-seas/)_ left off, simultaneously building tension and atmosphere through his sparsely decorated beats and haunting vocals. As in the two previous cuts, the piano plays a pivotal role in the formation of _Blue Break_; remaining a stunning constant amongst a wave of twisted dubstep inspired percussion samples and Isaac’s soothing lyrics. Stream _Blue Break_ below, and head over to **Isaac’s** [bandcamp](http://jamieisaac.bandcamp.com/) for free downloads of the two previous tracks; [_Softly Draining Seas_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11038-new-jamie-isaac-softly-draining-seas/) and _[Intro/Drowning Roots](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10870-introducing-jamie-isaac/)_.
